name: Quark Spectrum
description:
I've been using GMS for years, and haven't really stemed to far out from experimenting and coming up with 'concepts'. This was a small little challenge for me; that is, to make any sort of game in the shortest period of time. 

The goal of the game is simple, shoot at the coloured shapes with beams of colour that match that shape's colour. There are even secondary coloured shapes that require two different colours to destroy!

I really liked the idea of making things very colourful and vibrant, and just mindlessly shooting at things. From that, this was what I created.

Project Start Date: 26th April 2018

Project Finish: 2nd May 2018

Time Spent: ~20 Hours (give or take a couple)
